jsat.clustering.dissimilarity

Class WardsDissimilarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsat.clustering.dissimilarity.AbstractClusterDissimilarity
      • jsat.clustering.dissimilarity.DistanceMetricDissimilarity
        • jsat.clustering.dissimilarity.LanceWilliamsDissimilarity
          • jsat.clustering.dissimilarity.WardsDissimilarity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterDissimilarity, UpdatableClusterDissimilarity

    public class WardsDissimilarity
extends LanceWilliamsDissimilarity
    An implementation of Ward's method for hierarchical clustering. This method merges clusters based on the minimum total variance of the resulting clusters.

      • aConst

        protected double aConst(boolean iFlag,
            int ni,
            int nj,
            int nk)
        Description copied from class: LanceWilliamsDissimilarity
        This method computes the value of the α variable. A flag is used to control whether the value for the cluster i and k is being computed, or the value for the cluster j and k.
        Specified by:
        aConst in class LanceWilliamsDissimilarity
        Parameters:
        iFlag - true indicates that αi is the value to compute, false indicated that αj should be computed.
        ni - the number of points that make up cluster i
        nj - the number of points that make up cluster j
        nk - the number of points that make up cluster k
        Returns:
        the value of the variable α
